text: The 2008 Lebanese Women's Football League was the 1st edition of the Lebanese Women's Football League. Sadaka won the competition's first title, with a 2–1 victory over Ansar in the final matchday of the season. ==League table== {| class="wikitable" |+ !Pos !Team !Pld !W !D !L !GF !GA !GD !Pts |- |1 |Sadaka |10 |8 |1 |1 | | | +89 |25 |- |2 |Ansar |10 |7 |1 |2 | | | |22 |- |3 |Homenmen | | | | | | | |12 |- | rowspan="3" |? |Shabab Tripoli | | | | | | | | |- |Adab & Riyada | | | | | | | | |- |Shabab Arabi | | | | | | | | |} ==See also== *2008 Lebanese Women's FA Cup ==References== ==External links== *RSSSF.com Category:Lebanese Women's Football League seasons W1 Category:2008–09 domestic women's association football leagues
title: 2008 Lebanese Women's Football League
